data.name: Foundry Helix
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a permanent.
Foundry Helix deals 4 damage to any target. If the sacrificed permanent was an artifact, you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: Steel never forgets the strike of the forge.

data.name: Friendly Fire
data.oracle_text: Target creature's controller reveals a card at random from their hand. Friendly Fire deals damage to that creature and that player equal to the revealed card's mana value.
data.flavor_text:
"Never tell goblins to 'fire at will.'"
—Urut Barzeel, Mardu hordechief

data.name: Galvanic Blast
data.oracle_text:
Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to any target.
Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage instead if you control three or more artifacts.
data.flavor_text: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

data.name: Geistblast
data.oracle_text:
Geistblast deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}{U}, Exile Geistblast from your graveyard: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

data.name: Geistflame
data.oracle_text:
Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

data.name: Ghitu Fire
data.oracle_text:
You may cast Ghitu Fire as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Ghitu Fire deals X damage to any target.

data.name: Ghostfire
data.oracle_text:
Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

data.name: Giant's Ire
data.oracle_text: Giant's Ire deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. If you control a Giant, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The only feeling greater than hurling something a mile is crushing something else with it that was really, really irritating you.

data.name: Glacial Ray
data.oracle_text:
Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

data.name: Goblin Barrage
data.oracle_text:
Kicker—Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin. (You may sacrifice an artifact or Goblin in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Goblin Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked, it also deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.

data.name: Goblin Grenade
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Don't underestimate the aerodynamic qualities of the common goblin.

data.name: Goblin Grenade
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"According to accepted theory, the Grenade held some kind of flammable mixture and was carried to its target by a hapless Goblin."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV*

data.name: Goblin Grenade
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"I don't suppose we could teach them to *throw* the cursed things?"
—Ivra Jursdotter

data.name: Goblin Grenade
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"Without their massive numbers, the Goblins could never have launched such a successful offensive."
—*Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI*

data.name: Grapeshot
data.oracle_text:
Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
data.flavor_text: Mages often seek to emulate the powerful relics lost to time and apocalypse.

data.oracle_text:
Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
data.flavor_text: Mages often seek to emulate the powerful relics lost to time and apocalypse.

data.oracle_text:

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

data.oracle_text:

When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

data.oracle_text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

data.oracle_text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

data.name: Guerrilla Tactics
data.oracle_text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

data.name: Gut Shot
data.oracle_text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Gut Shot deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"Down here, we have a more pointed version of the scriptures."
—Urabrask's enforcer

data.name: Hammer of Bogardan
data.oracle_text:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

data.name: Hanabi Blast
data.oracle_text: Hanabi Blast deals 2 damage to any target. Return Hanabi Blast to its owner's hand, then discard a card at random.
data.flavor_text: The most powerful of akki fire spells were developed at the cost of blood, toil, tears, sweat, and usually a nose or two.

data.name: Harsh Justice
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

data.name: Harsh Sustenance
data.oracle_text: Harsh Sustenance deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.
data.flavor_text: The Shifting Wastes provide refuge to those who know where to look for it.

data.name: Haunting Misery
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X creature cards from your graveyard.
Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"I am condemned without end."
—Crovax

data.name: Heartfire
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

data.name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
data.oracle_text: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.
data.flavor_text: Hidetsugu never relinquished a grudge. He let it burn within him, gathering ever greater intensity until the final moment of vengeance.

data.name: Honorable Passage
data.oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to any target this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

data.name: Hornet Sting
data.oracle_text: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: It was only then—to his infinite sorrow—that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

data.name: Howling Gale
data.oracle_text:
Howling Gale deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.
Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Hungry Flames
data.oracle_text: Hungry Flames deals 3 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: In the hold of the *Heart of Kiran*, Chandra answered Dovin Baan's sabotage with an explosive retort.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition."
—Disa the Restless, journal entry

data.name: Hurricane
data.oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

data.name: Icequake
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, Icequake deals 1 damage to that land's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"When the earth shakes, and their animals are swallowed up by the ground, perhaps they will think twice before attacking again."
—Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

data.name: Igneous Inspiration
data.oracle_text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

data.name: Illuminate
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} and/or {3}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If this spell was kicked with its {2}{R} kicker, it deals X damage to that creature's controller. If this spell was kicked with its {3}{U} kicker, you draw X cards.

data.name: Improvised Weaponry
data.oracle_text: Improvised Weaponry deals 2 damage to any target. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
data.flavor_text: Anything can be a weapon if you swing it hard enough.

data.name: Incendiary Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Incendiary Command deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Incendiary Command deals 2 damage to each creature.
• Destroy target nonbasic land.
• Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

data.name: Incendiary Flow
data.oracle_text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text:
"What's your plan?" Gideon asked.
"Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

data.name: Incendiary Flow
data.oracle_text: Incendiary Flow deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: "What's your plan?" Gideon asked. "Are you serious?" Chandra replied.

data.name: Incinerate
data.oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
data.flavor_text: "Who said there are no assurances in life? I assure you this is going to hurt."

data.name: Incinerate
data.oracle_text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.flavor_text:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."

data.flavor_text:

data.flavor_text:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."

data.name: Inescapable Blaze
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.
Inescapable Blaze deals 6 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"The Izzet are blamed for every little disaster, which is unfair because we only cause most of them."
—Mizzix of the Izmagnus

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Wandering mage

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.name: Inferno
data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: "Any scrap of compassion that still existed in my soul was permanently snuffed out when they cast me out into the flames." —Mairsil, called the Pretender

data.oracle_text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Some have said there is no subtlety to destruction. You know what? They're dead."

data.name: Inferno Jet
data.oracle_text:
Inferno Jet deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "When the whole world is crazy, it's important to find something you can rely on."

data.name: Inspired Ultimatum
data.oracle_text: Target player gains 5 life, Inspired Ultimatum deals 5 damage to any target, then you draw five cards.
data.flavor_text:
"Inner peace is wonderful, and worth striving for. Outer peace is much less important."
—Taelya, Lavabrink pyromage

data.name: Invoke the Firemind
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Draw X cards.
• Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: To those in tune with the Firemind, there is no difference between knowledge and flame.

data.name: Ionize
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Ionize deals 2 damage to that spell's controller.
data.flavor_text: "Countermagic is a simple process of breaking matter into its elementary particles."

data.name: Izzet Charm

Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.

data.name: Kaervek's Purge
data.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with mana value X. If that creature dies this way, Kaervek's Purge deals damage equal to the creature's power to the creature's controller.

data.name: Kaervek's Torch
data.oracle_text:
As long as Kaervek's Torch is on the stack, spells that target it cost {2} more to cast.
Kaervek's Torch deals X damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
The pulsing heat of the midday Sun burns in the Lion's eye.
—Stone inscription, source unknown

data.name: Kaleidoscorch
data.oracle_text:
Converge — Kaleidoscorch deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

data.name: Kamahl's Sledge
data.oracle_text:
Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to target creature.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Kamahl's Sledge deals 4 damage to that creature and 4 damage to that creature's controller.

data.name: Kami's Flare
data.oracle_text: Kami's Flare deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Kami's Flare also deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller if you control a modified creature. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
data.flavor_text: "The flames are a gift from my companion. They won't hurt me. You, on the other hand..."

data.name: Kindle
data.oracle_text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
data.flavor_text: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

data.name: Kiss of Death
data.oracle_text: Kiss of Death deals 4 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. You gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"I'd sooner lock lips with a viper. At least I might walk away from *that*."
—Elvish scout

data.oracle_text:

To treat flesh wounds, use earth. To treat earth wounds, use flesh.

—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

data.name: Lavalanche

data.flavor_text: Alara's burning blood cannot be contained by mere earth and stone.

data.name: Lava Spike
data.oracle_text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: It's not the most subtle incantation, but it gets the point across.

data.name: Lava Spike
data.oracle_text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

data.oracle_text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to any target.

data.set_name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas
data.flavor_text:
"Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."
—Ajani

data.name: Lightning Helix
data.oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.

data.name: Lightning Helix
data.oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text:
"Mages in the Blood Age would call down actual thunderstorms on their enemies. I bet we can replicate their technique."
—Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student

data.name: Lightning Helix
data.oracle_text: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

data.name: Lightning Javelin
data.oracle_text: Lightning Javelin deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

data.name: Lightning Storm
data.oracle_text:
Lightning Storm deals X damage to any target, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on Lightning Storm.
Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

data.name: Lightning Strike
data.oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"Storm on the horizon, cap'n!"
—Grick Doobin, last words

data.name: Lightning Strike
data.oracle_text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"The hand of Keranos can be seen in every rumbling storm cloud. Best not to stand where he points."
—Rakleia of Shrine Peak

data.name: Lightning Surge
data.oracle_text:
Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to any target.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

data.name: Light Up the Night
data.oracle_text:
Light Up the Night deals X damage to any target. It deals X plus 1 damage instead if that target is a creature or planeswalker.
Flashback—{3}{R}, Remove X loyalty counters from among planeswalkers you control. If you cast this spell this way, X can't be 0. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Lorehold Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.
• Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.
• Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

data.name: Lunge
data.oracle_text: Lunge deals 2 damage to target creature and 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Cho-Arrim righteousness was no match for Benalish combat training.

data.name: Magma Burst
data.oracle_text:
Kicker—Sacrifice two lands. (You may sacrifice two lands in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Magma Burst deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to another target.

data.name: Magma Jet
data.oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.
data.flavor_text: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.

data.name: Magma Jet
data.oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

data.name: Magma Jet
data.oracle_text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to any target. Scry 2.

data.name: Make Mischief
data.oracle_text: Make Mischief deals 1 damage to any target. Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token. It has "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."
data.flavor_text: A tidy desk is as good as an invitation.

data.name: Melt Terrain
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
data.flavor_text: Just as the most finely wrought metal can warp and rust, so too does Mirrodin buckle under pressures from without and within.

data.name: Mindblaze
data.oracle_text: Choose a nonland card name and a number greater than 0. Target player reveals their library. If that library contains exactly the chosen number of cards with the chosen name, Mindblaze deals 8 damage to that player. Then that player shuffles.

data.name: Mindswipe
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Mindswipe deals X damage to that spell's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"The past and the unwritten are frozen. To understand their meaning requires heat."
—Arel the Whisperer

data.name: Misfortune
data.oracle_text:
An opponent chooses one —
• You put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life.
• You put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and Misfortune deals 4 damage to that player.

data.name: Molten Disaster
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
If this spell was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

data.name: Molten Influence
data.oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller has Molten Influence deal 4 damage to them.
data.flavor_text: Lavamancers make simple requests: obey or die.

data.name: Molten Rain
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
data.flavor_text: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.

data.name: Molten Rain
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
data.flavor_text: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.

data.name: Moonrager's Slash
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.
Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: The cathars fell like leaves as Tovolar himself joined the fray.

data.name: Morbid Hunger
data.oracle_text:
Morbid Hunger deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
Flashback {7}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Needle Drop
data.oracle_text:
Needle Drop deals 1 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"First it was plovers and mulldrifters. Now it's knitting needles the size of javelins."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

data.name: Neonate's Rush
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Vampire.
Neonate's Rush deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to its controller. Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"We spend our entire existence pursuing the joy of our first night's feast."
—Anje Falkenrath

data.name: Nerf War
data.oracle_text: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and Nerf War deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)
data.flavor_text:
"I'll tell you one thing—it's not nothin'!"
—Garj Grabclaw, goblin sergeant

data.name: Open Fire
data.oracle_text: Open Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

data.name: Orcish Cannonade
data.oracle_text:
Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"No ready! No aim! Just fire!"
—Scarback Plagg, orcish captain

data.name: Orcish Cannonade
data.oracle_text:
Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Crispy! Scarback! Load another volcano-ball."
—Stumphobbler Thuj, Orcish captain

data.name: Parallectric Feedback
data.oracle_text: Parallectric Feedback deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's mana value.
data.flavor_text: "You can't have so many people living so close together, all practicing so much magic, and not expect some feedback."

data.name: Parch
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Parch deals 2 damage to any target.
• Parch deals 4 damage to target blue creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Your porous flesh betrays you."
—Fire Eye, viashino bey

data.name: Pass the Torch
data.oracle_text: Pass the Torch deals 2 damage to any target. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target card named Pass the Torch from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, this creature perpetually loses this ability".

data.name: Peak Eruption
data.oracle_text: Destroy target Mountain. Peak Eruption deals 3 damage to that land's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"Early olive buds? A good omen. Flock of crows? Not so good. Mountain exploding? Bad. Very, very bad."
—Hira, street oracle

data.name: Pigment Storm
data.oracle_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
data.flavor_text: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.

data.name: Pillar of Flame
data.oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

data.name: Pillar of Flame
data.oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
data.flavor_text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

data.name: Play with Fire
data.oracle_text: Play with Fire deals 2 damage to any target. If a player is dealt damage this way, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: Devils find human dwellings to be oppressively cold, dark, and unburnt.

data.name: Poison the Well
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Poison the Well deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
data.flavor_text: Wells that provide clean, unhaunted water are rare enough to be worth building an entire town around.

data.name: Precision Bolt
data.oracle_text: Precision Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Ral had wielded lightning all his life but had never harnessed the power of an entire guild.

data.name: Prismari Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Prismari Command deals 2 damage to any target.
• Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards.
• Target player creates a Treasure token.
• Destroy target artifact.

data.name: Profane Prayers
data.oracle_text: Profane Prayers deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: "We have ways to make you talk, but you have nothing interesting to say."

data.name: Prophetic Bolt
data.oracle_text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

data.name: Prophetic Bolt
data.oracle_text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

data.name: Provoke the Trolls
data.oracle_text: Provoke the Trolls deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it gets +5/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I like burning and pillaging as much as anyone, but sometimes it's just easier to throw a rock and let the trolls do the work."
—Urik, Tuskeri raid leader

data.name: Psionic Blast
data.oracle_text: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

data.name: Psionic Blast
data.oracle_text: Psionic Blast deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

data.name: Psychic Purge
data.oracle_text:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Psychic Purge, that player loses 5 life.

data.name: Psychotic Haze
data.oracle_text:
Psychotic Haze deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

data.name: Pulse of the Forge
data.oracle_text: Pulse of the Forge deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. Then if that player or that planeswalker's controller has more life than you, return Pulse of the Forge to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Before wars or weapons, there was anger.

data.name: Puncture Blast
data.oracle_text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)
Puncture Blast deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Gnarltrunk didn't remember having quite that many knotholes.

data.name: Punishing Fire
data.oracle_text:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Punishing Fire
data.oracle_text:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Punish the Enemy
data.oracle_text: Punish the Enemy deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker and 3 damage to target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"When justice descends, the servant will burn with the master."
—Aurelia

data.name: Pyromatics
data.oracle_text:
Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

data.name: Quenchable Fire
data.oracle_text: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player or planeswalker at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless that player or that planeswalker's controller pays {U} before that step.
data.flavor_text: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

data.name: Rain of Embers
data.oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

data.name: Rakdos Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Exile target player's graveyard.
• Destroy target artifact.
• Each creature deals 1 damage to its controller.
data.flavor_text:
"Let all feel joy in pain."
—Rakdos

data.name: Rakdos's Return
data.oracle_text: Rakdos's Return deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards X cards.
data.flavor_text: When Lord Rakdos stirred from his slumber, everyone else's nightmare began.

data.name: Ral's Outburst
data.oracle_text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek

data.name: Ram Through
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. If the creature you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Need a medic! And some stonemasons!"
—Wyllon, Drannith merchant

data.name: Rancid Earth
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target land.
Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that land and Rancid Earth deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

data.name: Ravaging Blaze
data.oracle_text:
Ravaging Blaze deals X damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ravaging Blaze also deals X damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: In time, not even the fire monks could keep up with Chandra.

data.name: Reality Hemorrhage
data.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Reality Hemorrhage deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Tarek could not tell whether he was losing his blood or his mind.

data.name: Reckless Abandon
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Reckless Abandon deals 4 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: The climax of a warlord's career is always death.

data.name: Red Sun's Zenith
data.oracle_text: Red Sun's Zenith deals X damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead. Shuffle Red Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

data.name: Rekindled Flame
data.oracle_text:
Rekindled Flame deals 4 damage to any target.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may return Rekindled Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Release the Ants
data.oracle_text: Release the Ants deals 1 damage to any target. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Release the Ants to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

data.name: Rending Flame
data.oracle_text: Rending Flame deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If that permanent is a Spirit, Rending Flame also deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"It is our duty to bring the Blessed Sleep to the dead, even if they resist that gift."
—Grete, Order of Saint Traft

data.name: Repeating Barrage
data.oracle_text:
Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to any target.
Raid — {3}{R}{R}: Return Repeating Barrage from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

data.name: Resounding Thunder
data.oracle_text:
Resounding Thunder deals 3 damage to any target.
Cycling {5}{B}{R}{G} ({5}{B}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Resounding Thunder, it deals 6 damage to any target.

data.name: Rhystic Lightning
data.oracle_text: Rhystic Lightning deals 4 damage to any target unless that permanent's controller or that player pays {2}. If they do, Rhystic Lightning deals 2 damage to the permanent or player.

data.name: Rift Bolt
data.oracle_text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
